Title: Future of DynamicDataDisplay
Description: This is project which will contain my changes in DynamicDataDisplay (dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com). I will seek for being consistent and compatible with DynamicDataDisplay.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is project which will contain my changes in DynamicDataDisplay (dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com). I will seek for being consistent and compatible with DynamicDataDisplay.

Links

Help me to improve DynamicDataDisplay - take a part in our survey: http://microsoft.cs.msu.su/Projects/Pages/D3Poll.aspx

News about DynamicDataDisplay development - Twitter at http://twitter.com/DynamicDataDisp.

If you want to have in DynamicDataDisplay some feature that is currently missing, please use 'Issue Tracker' tab to introduce new feature or vote for existing one.

DynamicDataDisplay wiki - http://microsoft.cs.msu.su/personal/thecentury/Public%20Documents/Wiki/D3.html
